(x+4)^5 = x^5+5*x^4*4+10*x^3*4^2+10*x^2*4^3+x*4^4+4^5
(1-5y)^4 = 1^4-4*1^3*5y+6*1^2*5y^2-4*1*5y^3+5y^4
(1-4x)^8 = 1^8-8*1^7*4x+28*1^6*4x^2-56*1^5*4x^3+70*1^4*4x^4-56*1^3*4x^5+28*1^2*4x^6-8*1*4x^7+4x^8

0.011

0.25 * 5 = 1.25 1
0.25...

0.19 * 16 = 3.04 3		3
0.04 * 16 = 0.64 0		0
0.64 * 16 = 10.24 10	A
0.24 * 16 = 3.84 3		3
0.84 * 16 = 13.44 13	D
0.44 * 16 = 7.04 7		7
0.04...					0

39.6875 = 00100111.1011 = 27.B

0.6875 * 16 = 11

39 / 16 = 2.4375 2
7 / 16 = 0.4375 7
